title: The Psychology of Serial Killers
description:
Why do serial killers kill? Dr. Kirk Honda was asked this question (and many others) by Dave Scott on Space Out Radio.

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.
July 31, 2019.

Email: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/contact

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
